ct=_closeTags[seq];if(ct){ansiCodes.pop();return ct;}return'';});var l=ansiCodes.length;l>0&&(ret+=Array(l+1).join(''));return ret;}ansiHTML.setColors=function(colors){if(typeof hex=colors.hasOwnProperty(key)?colors[key]:null;if(!hex){_finalColors[key]=_defColors[key];continue;}if('reset'===key){if(typeof defHexColor=_defColors[key];if(!hex[0]){hex[0]=defHexColor[0];}if(hex.length===1||!hex[1]){hex=[hex[0]];hex.push(defHexColor[1]);}hex=hex.slice(0,2);}else if(typeof hex!=='string'){throw new Error('The value of `'+key+'` property must be a hex string, e.g.: FF0000');}_finalColors[key]=hex;}_setTags(_finalColors);};ansiHTML.reset=function(){_setTags(_defColors);};ansiHTML.tags={};if(Object.defineProperty){Object.defineProperty(ansiHTML.tags,'open',{get:function get(){return _openTags;}});Object.defineProperty(ansiHTML.tags,'close',{get:function get(){return _closeTags;}});}else{ansiHTML.tags.open=_openTags;ansiHTML.tags.close=_closeTags;}function oriColor=colors[color]||'000';_openTags[code]='color:#'+oriColor;code=parseInt(code);_openTags[(code+10).toString()]='background:#'+oriColor;}}ansiHTML.reset();
